body:
Sorry to be so cold, but I think this has to be said.

1.8 sucks, people constantly tell them to put VBO on, or OptiFine, or even tell us to get a new PC...

Just stop it, 1.8 sucks, and all the bugs are back anyway.

And Kylo, you say 80% of Avicadians use 1.8. Well what about the other 20%? Do you want your 100% STAY 100% or 80% to be your NEW 100%?

Its just stupid, Im not telling you never update the server, just make it stay 1.7 and 1.8, and Kylo, you still say that we have alot of lag with 1.7 and 1.8, well 1.8 alone is doing MORE, so why not just 1.7 AND 1.8?

Everyone will be happy.

Until this happens or if I get a new 1000$ PC with an extremely strong graphics card, Im going to be leaving MC in general. 

PS: If you see me ingame Im probably my cousin with an extremely good PC.
body_tagged:
Sorry to be so cold, but I think this has to be said.

1.8 sucks, people constantly tell them to put VBO on, or OptiFine, or even tell us to get a new PC...

Just stop it, 1.8 sucks, and all the bugs are back anyway.

And Kylo, you say 80% of Avicadians use 1.8. Well what about the other 20%? Do you want your 100% STAY 100% or 80% to be your NEW 100%?

Its just stupid, Im not telling you never update the server, just make it stay 1.7 and 1.8, and Kylo, you still say that we have alot of lag with 1.7 and 1.8, well 1.8 alone is doing MORE, so why not just 1.7 AND 1.8?

Everyone will be happy.

Until this happens or if I get a new 1000$ PC with an extremely strong graphics card, Im going to be leaving MC in general. 

PS: If you see me ingame Im probably my cousin with an extremely good PC.

replies.body:
I will not be insensitive to you as most other people here are, because i can feel your frustration and your anger and because im not a dick.

If your PC is from 2007 then the best option would be to buy a new one or buy parts to modify your PC to keep it updated with the current timeline. 

If your CPU is an AMD then thats probably your problem. When I had my laptop with an A6 AMD CPU 1.8 was shit for me. But now I have a desktop with an intel i7-890. 8 GB of RAM. 

My recommendation for you is to get 8GB of RAM from staples (79.99 USD) get help on how to install. Buy an i7 CPU from best buy, PC Richardson and Son or Staples. Or whatever hardware store your country has.

If you cannot get these because of money limitations then I'm afraid that no one can help you.

Every server is 1.8 and we cannot slow down for 20% of the population over the 80%. It will be impractical and unfair. Our player base will dwindle very fast  and that is not an option.

replies.body:
Well, sorry to tell you this, but most servers were bound to change to 1.8 anyways, and if you can't cope with that, then I'm honestly surprised with how you can cope with changes in your life.

What I'm saying is change is normal. May not be good or bad, but change happening is inevitable. 

Seriously, don't come on the forums to complain about an FPS problem. Problems don't go away by complaining. You'll have to fix the problem yourself or learn to live with it. 

And, before you come here to start saying Kylo did a bad job, you have to remember that we have opinions too. We know 1.8 is laggy and the update is buggy, but we're not super humans. We simply just learn to lie with it and take satisfaction out of what we DO receive. 

Also, the amount of "1.8 sucks" threads have gotten out of hand. You're only dragging the community down with threads like this, as they have no benefit to the forums whatsoever. 

And sure, 1.8 may suck, but take what doesn't suck from it and use that instead. 

Honestly.
replies.body_tagged:

Seriously, don't come on the forums to complain about an FPS problem. Problems don't go away by complaining. You'll have to fix the problem yourself or learn to live with it. 

And, before you come here to start saying Kylo did a bad job, you have to remember that we have opinions too. We know 1.8 is laggy and the update is buggy, but we're not super humans. We simply just learn to lie with it and take satisfaction out of what we DO receive. 

Also, the amount of "1.8 sucks" threads have gotten out of hand. You're only dragging the community down with threads like this, as they have no benefit to the forums whatsoever. 

And sure, 1.8 may suck, but take what doesn't suck from it and use that instead. 

Honestly.

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/data
Data shows that 54718 players used a 1.8 client, which is 67.38% of the total players. Yeah, the majority of Avicus played with 1.8 already.
However, 26495 players used a 1.7 client, which is only 32.62% of the total players.
Okay, Avicus has 50 thousand players who favor 1.8, but still, 20 thousand players may be upset... The minority is actually a large group of people, it would be pretty sad to see 20 thousand players leave.

for you. You have 25ms on AU Kohi and 18cps so even if on NA servers, you have great reach anyways. PvP in 1.8 is a THOUSAND times easier when you constantly outreach people tbh. You gain 1/4 of a block reach if you get first hit. You lose a lot of reach if you don't.

replies.body:
That shows sessions, not players (54,718 server joins using 1.8, etc). In addition, that is all the data we have since a few a weeks ago. More recent data would show more 1.8.

The tracking showed that roughly 80% of players used 1.8. This doesn't mean we lose 20% of our player count.That means they will either adapt or leave MC multiplayer entirely, once we're all 1.8.

replies.body:
80%...including random players and tbh 80% of the people who visit AVN don't come back, same applies to all other servers.  

And what happens to the 20%? Doesn't necessarily mean they will leave, but that's 20% of the people on the server at the time and to seem to take 1/5 of the people who got on that day for nothing. That's a variable that you just seem to disregard. If half of those people leave, that's 1/10th of potential players gone.

replies.body: It's subjective, we just needed to decide when to pull the trigger. We determined 20% was fair, considering so many servers have already switched or accept 1.8. Thanks to the update too, we have better server performance, decreasing costs and increasing the quality of gameplay. Overall, this should help boost player count.

These whole 1.8 leaving posts are really not needed. I've been reading them, and the amount of drama is just, ugh. Accept it, don't go around telling people its wrong, don't make a leaving post and then blame the devs for changing to 1.8 because you can't play with it, when plenty of people can. We get it, your machine isn't made for 1.8. But really, the drama? Come on now.



Edit: That did seem a little dramatic after reading it again, but the point stands.

replies.body:
You guys need to put yourselves in their shoes. I used to have a problem with 1.8 but now, I do not because of the CPU im using is an Intel. 

I've learned that 1.8 is a bane to ones with AMD CPUs and is a boon to ones with Intel CPUs. 

Getting an Nvidia GPU can also help as well. Get a GTX series.

Anyway, you guys are being inconsiderate. Instead of telling them to "get used to it, how about giving some useful tips to counter their problems?

replies.body:
This is what exactly happened to MCSG when they updated to 1.8 completely. Most of the people were saying the server was going downfall, and they were going to leave. Everyone eventually got used to everything, and everything is fine now.

You just gotta give it some time to get used to the new PvP aspects. Same with me, I used to hate 1.8, and only played on 1.7 until I was forced to. Eventually, 1.8 became easier to play on then 1.7 at one point.

Besides, you have to accept the fact that all minecraft servers won't be staying in 1.7 forever. Why not think of it as getting used to 1.8 faster then other 1.7 users?
